name: Combenefit

screenshots.caption: Just select the folder where all your combination replicates are, select your model and outputs and run the analysis!
Combenefit populates the project folder with the model based analysis
Access data on figure and use many other options to manipulate your figures through the upper bar
Statistical significance level is displayed on the matrix plot
You can manipulate 3D plots to get better views
Open the appropriate folder and retrieve the image you want to insert in your paper or report

short_description:
Combenefit software is a standalone application for Windows that performs surface analyses of drug and other agent combinations to identify synergy. 

The (preferred) version for 64-bit operating systems is directly available through the green button or here:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/combenefit/files/WIN_64%20%28PREFERRED%29/

A version for 32-bit operating systems is available here:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/combenefit/files/WIN_32/

A quick user's guide is available here:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/combenefit/files/Combenefit_v1.31_quick_guide_v1.02.pdf/download

Several examples are available here:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/combenefit/files/Examples/

A template file to save experimental data can be found here:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/combenefit/files/REPLICATE_TEMPLATE.xls/download

Also please see the Wiki for reported problems and fix, as well as discussions on future releases.
summary: Synergy analyses of drug and other other agent combinations
